title: So Yasuo is at 100% ban rate now
body:
Oops.

http://i.imgur.com/79ElADZ.jpg?noredirect

http://i.imgur.com/ECgs6mn.jpg?noredirect

http://i.imgur.com/GRvEVCF.jpg?noredirect

http://i.imgur.com/dNejBW8.jpg?noredirect

No he isn't...

Saw a bunch of posts saying this so I went to check for myself, because I don't believe in punching a ballot based on some headlines you saw. Then I found *gasp* he is not even close to 100% ban rate. But according to a few of the big stat trackers, Zac is getting there.

replies.body: What's the point of this shitpost?
Dispell false rumors that he hit 100% ban rate. He isn't even S2 Kassadin ban rates. Though Zac almost is.

They never were rumors.

People simply predicted that he would be at 100% banrate, and he is for those people.

no

people said he was going to reach 100% which is bullshit because no high elo player is going to ban him

and now he didn't

period
My blacklist's not working any more... great.
Gotta block out dem facts or the echo chamber mighy cave in!

Actually I blocked Janna/Sona x Rubick because of the elo elitism he/she shows in a lot of the written threads lately.

Literally "I am high elo so what I say is a written rule while you are low elo and your opinion is worthless"
Odd, even when we disagree Rubick has never rank shamed me and I am on my second season in Silver *thinking face*

Well I'm not talking about rank shaming someone personal, I'm saying it overall. It's posts like "it's not a problem in high elo so it doesn't need to be looked at" that are the problem. It's a problem because it just sounds like: You're low elo so your opinions don't matter.

Nop, it's more like "it's not a problem in high elo, and this is what i care about"
i never cared about your elo
riot should change yasuo because of you? k i won't disagree, but i still don't care because i decide if i care or not

they said yasuo is going to be reworked, because low mmr players can't deal with him, 
you got what you wanted

until then, the facts are real, yasuo didn't reach 100% ban rate

i don't know why there is a debate on this
It isnt the fact that we cant play against yasuo, it is the fact that we dont want to play against yasuo, because his kit is so problematic ---> high ban rates.

No Rubick just doesn't give a heck about low tier balancing beyond not buffing binary shit like Garen to be toxic freelo in low tier. A bronze player can learn to play better to reach a balance point in a game balanced around high tier as they can gain the skills that make it balanced in those tiers. But a high tier player cannot play worse to make the game balanced for them if it is balanced around low tiers. Generally games should be balanced for the best players, with only moderate consideration for the low tier(like not buffing Garen until reworked).

Oh you're silver?  Want rank?

I'd love to play a few games with ya.

I don't play LoL enough to rank up my friend. If anything I would drag your elo down. No amount of loving the game and it's design will compensate a lack of physical practice. I only have about 2500 games played including aram and shit... in 6 years.

I play mostly norms anyway to be honest. Ranked stresses me out too much. 

Norms are stress free (but can still be frustrating).
We could play a couple of games. Maybe not ranked, but norms would do fine.

> [{quoted}](name=TyrekGoldenspear,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=gKTQK0v6,comment-id=000400000000000000000001000000000001000000000001,timestamp=2017-06-13T13:21:38.658+0000)
>
> We could play a couple of games. Maybe not ranked, but norms would do fine.

That'd be great later tonight.

Find a duo partner. Mine is a guy who plays cancerous, simple champions to terrifyingly effective degrees and I amplify that like a crystal with my picks.

Because Shen is beyond useless in low elo.

Heh, that's a pretty funny catch. I could say Zac is utter trash and claim he has only a 2% win rate for all my games by purposely losing them. I suppose those people who said Yasuo would be 100% banned aren't wrong for their games.
I think the problem was Lol king not properly taking double bans into account when the system was first introduced, so Zac and Yasuo displayed 102% ban rates

> [{quoted}](name=MadKnife IV,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=gKTQK0v6,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2017-06-12T16:41:24.246+0000)
>
> They never were rumors.
> 
> People simply predicted that he would be at 100% banrate, and he is for those people.

I'm pretty sure that Rioter post about the Yas rework mentioned a 100% banrate
64% pretty sure. Anyhow it's still pretty high.
This high elo?  Cause that's probably why.
Plat+ for 3 websites gold+ for the other. However even in Bronze Yas is not even close to 100%. He is 62% there.
Which is actually pretty high.
Well it is bronze. They have to ban stuff like Garen and Yi who against better players are negligable in most matchups

I have never seen anyone ban Garen in bronze honestly. 

Yi sure, usually because he somehow finds a way to get fed off my botlane.
Lucky. I play in silver and that shit gets banned.
I wish I could play against the idiots you end up dealing with. I'd like to climb.
Ya .. too bad I almost never play ranked.

well for me {{champion:122}} is 100% ban rate because I ban him in all my games

so I am sure for some people {{champion:157}}  is at a 100% ban rate hehe

see what i did there :P

but yeah Zac is higher on the ban rate than Yas tis is true atm :D
I've been doing my part to ensure Zac's ban rate increased.

I don't think people were trying to say yasuo would literally hit 100% ban rate in all elos, that's just statistically unlikely.

Maybe have a snickers; you're taking this a tad too seriously.
U're looking at Plat+ ? Try lower ranks
He's banned in about 70% of my matches. Fizz is banned in 98% of them.
{{champion:38}}

Unless the new ban system that we have where you can ban the same champ twice counts towards an overarching 200% ban rate, 100% should be statistically impossible since I'd imagine that he's slipped by the banning phase at least once.

Don't get me wrong, I'm not on the Yasuo QQ train. Just wanted to say to keep in mind that champion.gg's ban rates are very far off. I dont know why but that sites ban rates are massively incorrect. Compare its numbers to other sites and you'll see.
I posted 4 for a reason. None of them are believable on their own but alltogether they give a general idea.
I honestly feel like most sites are crap. LoLking couldn't get my level right until midseason 6.

He's at 55.2% in bronze banning and about 46% overall.
Still ridiculously high, but not 100%.
High yes. But not 100% or even close to 100%. Also in plat through challenger he steadily drops to none. Because they know which champions are worth banning based on meta and team comp.

Lol asked a IRL challenger buddy about how often his Elo bans yasou.

 He looked at me funny and said "who the hell bans yasou?" His elos must ban or else the game is an instant loss "his words" were lulu and ivern

So much this. 
Before the ten ban system yasuo was basically permaban in my elo (something that bothered me since yasuo is nothing compared to current draven, lulu, ivern, zac etc) and since the ten ban system i've played 6 games in a row against yasuo. Really seems like people hope the other side will ban him thus statistics are skewed. 
Give it a week or two when fiora and some others got nerfed and yasuo banrate will go up.

Perhaps if there was actually 10 bans instead of up to 10 bans, Yasuo would see closer to a 100% banrate. Because with this nonsense of double banning, there's more immediate champions to ban.

We'll never know until Riot releases it.
That would make champ select long, boring and would increase queue times if someone dodged. Besides, i hardly see more than 1 repeated ban.
WAIT, YASUO CANT GET NERF

thats the thing, you cant really trust your teammates to know how to fight him and if hes a good Yas and they dont know "how to fight him" its pretty much GG, nevermind the Yasuos you get on your team sometimes that have no clue of  how 2 play him and feed like crazy.

for example: I have shut down yas before top lane geting like 3-0 in kills and nearly double cs but he roamed mid/bot got kills cs and proceeded to carry the game, although many other champs can do this I think its easier for YAS and champs like KAT
